about_the_game:
In Autofahrt you have to flee alone or with friends from an approaching deadly sandstorm.
In a car and with up to 6 players, you drive on a road with many intersections that leads to random locations.
Once there, you have to look for resources such as gasoline, tools and spare parts to repair and improve your car.
But you have no time to waste, the storm is approaching and there is only one chance to survive, you have to reach the bunker before the storm hits you.

Key Features

  • Drive your car to randomly placed locations
  • Search for parts to repair and improve your vehicle
  • Find new cars and equipment
  • Host or join a game via Steam with upto 6 players
  • Ingame communication: Voice chat / chat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD RX 470 - 4GB VRAM (Shader Model 6.6 Atomics)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 480 - 8 GB VRAM (Shader Model 6.6 Atomics)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: A storm is gathering and devouring everything. Drive for your life alone or with friends and escape the deadly storm. Repair and keep your vehicle intact, it's the only way to reach the bunker and survive.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
